title: Two Planes Collide in Midair at Dallas Air Show, Officials Say
description: There was no immediate word about casualties after the crash, which involved two World War II-era planes at an air show in Dallas on Saturday.
dc:creator: Vimal Patel and April Rubin

media:content.media:credit: Mike Lawrence/Evansville Courier & Press, via Associated Press
media:content.media:description: Visitors surrounding a B-17 “Flying Fortress” at the Evansville Wartime Museum in Indiana in 2019. A B-17 was one of the planes involved in a crash in Dallas on Saturday.
